titleStmt.title: Another declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament concerning subscriptions for bringing in money, plate, and horses together with additions to the former instructions for deputy lievtenants ... as also the copy of a letter sent to Master William Crofts at the Hague by Master Henry Wilmot ... and a letter from the Earle of Warwick to Mr. John Pym ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.
Rochester, Henry Wilmot, Earl of, 1612?-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
